title: Help with queue block timer!
body: So i just disconnected twice in champ select. Wifi was a bit out of it it seems, although now i must wait 30 mins to play again -.- Any help? thank you

replies.body:
It looks like you received an escalated [queue dodge](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging).  Be super careful about playing anymore matchmade games until whatever is causing it gets resolved.  Especially in ranked, you'll start losing a lot of LP!  Even if the dodge isn't intentional, the system will treat everyone equally so I recommend fixing up your wifi before going back in.

Use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help improve your connection as well, and test it in a custom.  I hope that helps!
Now i am in low priority queue but i havent dodged any, why am i in 20minute queue?? it was fine just a minute ago
